comments:
Hi,

I have downloaded wtp-all-in-one-sdk-R-1.5.0-200606281455-win32.zip which is a complete pack of wtp on Eclipse 3.2
Refering to http://www.eclipse.org/webtools/community/tutorials/ejbtutorial/buildingejbs.html for a tutorial.
While trying to create the EJB, I am getting org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Extended Operation failure: org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.ejb.annotation.internal.operations.AddSessionBeanOperation
.
I have tried that on j2sdk1.4.2_08 and jdk-1.5.0_02-windows with JBoss - jboss-4.0.2

Tried searching net to see if there is anything logged on this one.
Any help is highly appreciated.

regards,
Mohan

I see the same exception. I was trying to create a session bean using above mentioned config.Can some one post why this is invalid or direct me where to get more information. 
Prasad
prasadp@hotmail.com
This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP bugs which are in the resolved state without an appropriate targeted version.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
